A 'pyramid scheme' is a non-sustainable business model that involves promising
participants payment or services, primarily for enrolling other people into the
scheme, rather than supplying any real investment or sale of products or
services to the
public. [http://www.fbi.gov/majcases/fraud/fraudschemes.htm#pyramid Common
Fraud Schemes: Pyramid Scheme] ''Federal Bureao of
Investigation
